name: Driving Simulator Music
desc: Menu music I made for an unreleased driving simulator.

name: They Call Me Bagel
desc: It's true. People call me that.

name: Orchestral Action Music
desc: Action music I made for an indie RPG.

name: Zombie Shooter Soundtrack
desc: The overall soundtrack for a zombie shooter game. It starts out calm, and eventually becomes more tense.

name: Welcome To Space
desc: Some upbeat music for the Welcome, Primitive Lifeform, to Space Soundtrack

name: The Ordinance
desc: The theme for a spaceship capable of mass destruction, from Welcome, Primitive Lifeform, To Space (WPLTS).

name: ACX-48
desc: The theme for a mining facility, in which players are encouraged to raid, from WPLTS.

name: Face Making
desc: A piece I composed for a character creation menu.

name: Afraid
desc: From my album, "Friend", which I wrote during a not-so-great time in my life. This song in particular is supposed to sound rather unsettling. Enjoy.

name: Mostly a Day Off
desc: A song I wrote on a day that I surprisingly didn't have to do anything.

name: Bulk
desc: Another one of my singles, written during a period of time in which I had a lot going on. I also spent an incredible amount of time fine tuning the details of this song.

name: Slippery Floors and Squeaky Shoes
desc: Sometimes you just can't maintain balance, ya know?

name: My Kneecaps Ran Away
desc: Life without these would be hard.
